text: yadera jan'ya sastira bani abadharita hayeche, tara balabe, ‘he amadera raba! Era to tara yaderake amara bibhranta karechilama; amara ederake bibhranta karechilama yemana amara bibhranta hayechilama; apanara samipe amara tadera byapare dayamuktata ghosana karachi [1]. Era to amadera ‘ibadata karata na.’
